message_2:
To encrypt the message "MATHEMATICS IS COOL" using the rail fence cipher with a key of 3, we will arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows. We will remove the spaces to make the encryption process easier.

1. Write the message in a zigzag pattern:

M   E   A   S   O
 A H M T C I C O L
  T   I   S   C

2. Read the message from left to right, top to bottom:

MEASOAHMTCICOLTI_SC

So, the encrypted message using the rail fence cipher with a key of 3 is "MEASOAHMTCICOLTI_SC".
